comment: Good teacher,  very clear, and quick with email responses. Just make sure that you make that deadline or else it might not be accepted.

worst class ever, which is sad because it had potential to be fun.She makes you do stupid presentations on topics.If it is not your week to present then you will be extremly bored b/c you just sit there.She expects you to not just read the text but MEMORIZE it word for word.  Her test cover over 100 pages and she only gives 2 tests. DO NOT TAKE!

Save your money on tuition and just read the book.  She is inexperienced and brings WAY too much of her personal drama and prejudices to the classroom.  I've never had someone who expects what she does of students who can't even elaborate on or explain what the definition in th text means.  She expects high level work, but gives low level teaching.
